data.message: You've got it eminem you just need to stop with the violence and swearing I know you've got a lot of anger in your body

replies.message: No! This was when he was the best.

Fuck up he is what he is we love him for who he is however he makes his music we will always love it. ......... peace from Scotland muthafukers
Swearing is the way to go woman 😉.. Well I think he's done with "Violence" thing .. 😊
You should listen to something else then cause the "swearing and violence" is what made him who he is.
He's turning into that person he didn't want to be didn't he have a bad upbringing
How the fuck is he violent? Cursing doesn't make you a bad person.
Didn't say he was violent he's music is violent

I wouldn't say his music is "violent" it's music!  Each person takes it their own way. If you take it  offensive then maybe you need to focus on your upbringing and not his. And there is always the option of not listening to it to! Just a thought!
I find ems music motivational. You are perceiving his lyrics a different way.

Its just music....what he raps about isn't violent and I've listened to all of his lyrics from his songs and they are far from violent. He speaks the truth and is inspirational to half the rappers today
^ haha yeah I guess beating your ex and locking her in a trunk to drive her off a cliff isn't violent.
Beth Miller Stan wasn't about Eminem for one so get your facts straight. Stan was about a fictional character who was an obsessive fan over Eminem's work and himself.
Karri Benedix  your full of shit
Nick quirk your full of shit
So, you basically want him to change who he is as a person? Smh
Yeah Stan wasn't about Kim but "97 Bonnie & Clyde" he talks about dumping Kim & her new bf & his kid into the water 🤗 Idc though I love Em & that was his early stuff
Tracy Ann yes
Or maybe you should listen to "Kim" Kierra bc he talks about killing her in that song 2
Smh....Eminem will never change who he is no matter what if anyone doesn't like who he is now.
Kierra Young how do u know

Jacqueline thanks for saying I am full of shit. It truly represents the kind of person you are. I completely understand how you can now perceive eminems lyrics. You should just unlike eminem on Facebook and throw away all your mp3s, albums and anything related to eminem.
Listen to Headlights you'll see he is sorry for creating lyrics out of his anger. But it is who he is. I wouldn't change eminem one bit.
